import React from "react"; const DisplayPosts = ({id,test,data,del}) => { //const ids=Number(id) //console.log(ids) console.log(test) console.log('data',data) console.log('abc',id) const filteredPosts=data.filter(a => a.id ==id) console.log('filteredPosts.',filteredPosts) return(

ID: {id}

Title: {filteredPosts[0].title}

Category: {filteredPosts[0].category}

Text:{filteredPosts[0].text}

) }; export default DisplayPosts;
